Common.tagline: Scale Your Development Team to 10X with AI

Hero.title: Scale Your Development Team to 10X with AI
Hero.description: EmbodyAI revolutionizes software development by empowering developers with cutting-edge AI tools. Our platform accelerates coding, automates repetitive tasks, and amplifies developer productivity by 10X, transforming how teams build, deploy, and scale software solutions.

Features.title: Main Features
Features.description: AI-powered capabilities that remove repetitive work, accelerate delivery, and scale every developer to 10X productivity.

aiDeveloperAgent.title: AI Developer Agent
aiDeveloperAgent.description: Your intelligent coding companion that understands context, writes production-ready code, and learns your coding style. Scale your development velocity by 10X with an AI agent that acts as your senior developer pair.

automateWorkflow.title: Automate Workflow
automateWorkflow.description: Eliminate repetitive development tasks with intelligent workflow automation. From code generation to testing and deployment, automate your entire development pipeline and focus on creative problem-solving.

asyncCodingAgent.title: Async Coding Agent
asyncCodingAgent.description: Deploy AI coding agents that work asynchronously on your tasks while you sleep. Wake up to completed features, refactored code, and optimized solutions - truly enabling 24/7 development cycles.

codingPromptSharing.title: Coding Prompt Sharing
codingPromptSharing.description: Access and share a vast library of proven AI coding prompts with your team. Build a knowledge base of effective prompts for common development tasks and accelerate your team's AI-assisted coding proficiency.

aiTaskManagement.title: AI Task Management
aiTaskManagement.description: Intelligent project management that understands your codebase, automatically prioritizes tasks, estimates effort, and assigns work to team members or AI agents. Transform chaos into organized, efficient development cycles.

localAiRunner.title: Local AI Runner
localAiRunner.description: Run powerful AI models directly on your machine for maximum privacy and performance. No data leaves your environment while still accessing enterprise-grade AI capabilities for code generation, analysis, and optimization.

sectionOne.title: Scale Every Developer to 10X with AI-Powered Tools
sectionOne.description: EmbodyAI revolutionizes software development by empowering developers with cutting-edge AI agents and automation tools. Our platform transforms coding workflows, eliminates repetitive tasks, and amplifies developer productivity by 10X, making every developer feel like a superhuman coder.

aiPoweredCodeGeneration.title: AI-Powered Code Generation
aiPoweredCodeGeneration.description: Generate production-ready code 10X faster with our intelligent AI agents that understand your project context, coding style, and requirements. From complex algorithms to boilerplate code, our AI writes it all.

asyncDevelopment.title: 24/7 Async Development
asyncDevelopment.description: Deploy AI coding agents that work while you sleep. Wake up to completed features, refactored code, and optimized solutions. True continuous development that never stops.

privacyFirstLocalAi.title: Privacy-First Local AI
privacyFirstLocalAi.description: Run powerful AI models directly on your machine for maximum privacy and performance. Your code never leaves your environment while accessing enterprise-grade AI capabilities.

Contact.title: Ready to Scale Your Development to 10X?
Contact.description: Get in touch with our team to learn how EmbodyAI can accelerate your development workflow and amplify your productivity.

form.name: Your Name
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your development challenges and how we can help you scale to 10X productivity...
form.success: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully. Our team will get back to you soon.
form.errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
form.errorNetwork: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.

Footer.description: EmbodyAI revolutionizes software development by empowering developers with cutting-edge AI agents and automation tools. Scale your development team to 10X productivity and transform every developer into a superhuman coder.

CompanyIntro.title: EmbodyAI: 10X Developer Productivity
CompanyIntro.description: We build AI-powered tools that turn every developer into a superhuman coder and scale team output without scaling headcount.
CompanyIntro.p1: EmbodyAI accelerates real-world software delivery with code generation, automated testing, and intelligent code review that align to your stack.
CompanyIntro.p2: Our platform reduces cognitive load and eliminates repetitive tasks so teams focus on architecture, quality, and impact.
CompanyIntro.p3: Founded in 2025 in Japan, our mission is simple: scale every developer to 10X productivity through practical, developer-first AI.

Kidou.title: Kidou: GUI for AI Code Agents
Kidou.description: Kidou is a fast, unified desktop GUI for popular AI code agents like Claude Code, Cursor Agent, and Codex. Launch, switch, and control agents from one place with a native, developer-first interface.

whatIsKidou.title: What is Kidou?
whatIsKidou.description: Kidou (èµ·å‹• - "startup" in Japanese) is a unified desktop GUI for AI code agents. Control Claude Code, Cursor Agent, Codex, and more from one place with a fast, native interface built for developers.

multiSession.title: Unified Agent Launcher
multiSession.description: One hub to launch, view, and control your code agentsâ€”no tab juggling or context loss.

vibeCoding.title: Vibe Coding Experience
vibeCoding.description: Enter the flow state with an intuitive, responsive UI designed for seamless AI collaboration. Code, chat, and create without breaking momentum.

intelligentOrchestration.title: Seamless Controls & Shortcuts
intelligentOrchestration.description: Quick agent switching, inline actions, and keyboard-first workflows that feel like a native IDE.

claudeCode.title: Claude Code
claudeCode.description: Advanced coding assistant with deep code context understanding and exceptional reasoning capabilities.

cursorAgent.title: Cursor Agent
cursorAgent.description: Intelligent coding companion that understands your entire codebase and provides context-aware suggestions.

codex.title: Codex
codex.description: Powerful code generation model that excels at translating natural language into working code.

capabilities.title: Kidou Capabilities
capabilities.description: Unlock the full potential of AI-assisted development with a unified, developer-first GUI.

vibeCooding.title: ðŸ”¥ Enter the Vibe Coding Zone
vibeCooding.description: Experience a new way of coding where AI feels like a natural extension of your mind. Kidou's intuitive interface eliminates friction between thought and code, keeping you in the flow state longer.

tenxSpeed.title: âš¡ 10X Your Development Speed
tenxSpeed.description: With a unified, low-friction interface, you move faster across tasks and agentsâ€”less context switching, more focused progress.

cognitiveReduction.description: Let your agents handle details while you focus on high-level architecture and creative problem-solving. Your brain stays fresh for the tasks that matter most.

promo.title: Ready to Transform Your Coding Experience?
promo.description: Join the revolution in AI-assisted development with Kidou's unified GUI for code agents.

demoVideo.title: See Kidou in Action
demoVideo.description: Watch how Kidou streamlines your workflow with a unified GUI for Claude Code, Cursor Agent, and Codex.

cta.title: Ready to Experience Kidou?
cta.description: Join the early access program and be among the first developers to experience a unified GUI for AI coding agents with Kidou.

Breadcrumb.aboutDescription: Discover how we're revolutionizing software development by empowering developers with cutting-edge AI agents and automation tools. Founded in 2025, EmbodyAI transforms coding workflows and scales developer productivity to 10X levels.
Breadcrumb.contactDescription: Ready to transform your development workflow with AI? Get in touch with our team to discover how EmbodyAI can scale your coding productivity to 10X levels and accelerate your software development process.
